title: Election Update: Nevada!? “Fake” Ballots? 11.5.20
itunes:title: Election Update: Nevada!? “Fake” Ballots? 11.5.20
description:
In episode 753, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Bitchuation Room host Francesca Fiorentini to discuss Nevada election results, Trump campaigning alleging fraud, low energy scams, ballot counters needing to be paid more, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Nevada 2020 election results
  2. Georgia Judge Throws Out Trump Campaign Lawsuit That Produced Exactly Zero Evidence of Fraud
  3. On Fox & Friends, Pam Bondi warns about "fake ballots" in Pennsylvania. When pressed on it, Bondi just says "there could be" some, and mentions a bunch of stuff that is not "fake ballots."
  4. Ric Grennell ran away from an MSNBC reporter when asked to provide any evidence at all of the fraud accusations he just levied 
  5. An actual photo of the wagon and box that carries a device that allows us to go live. 
  6. Ballot-Counting Live Streams Show the Invisible Labor Behind Democracy
  7. Nevada, With All Due Respect, People Want You To Please Hurry The Hell Up
  8. How ballots are actually counted, explained by 3 election officials
  9. Driven by unfounded ‘SharpieGate’ rumor, pro-Trump protesters mass outside Arizona vote-counting center
  10. Watch Pastor Paula White-Cain’s intense prayer for Trump 2020 election win
  11. WATCH: Schoolboy Q - "W.Y.G.D.T.N.S. " Produced by The Alchemist

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
